import { useState } from "react"; import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { CButton, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, // CBadge, // CDataTable, // CCollapse, // CDropdownItem, // CDropdownMenu, // CDropdownToggle, // CFade, CForm, CFormGroup, // CFormText, // CValidFeedback, // CInvalidFeedback, // CTextarea, CInput, // CInputFile, // CInputCheckbox, // CInputRadio, // CInputGroup, // CInputGroupAppend, // CInputGroupPrepend, // CDropdown, // CInputGroupText, CSelect, CLabel, // CSelect, CRow, // CSwitch, } from "@coreui/react"; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import CIcon from "@coreui/icons-react"; import { getAllGroup, insertGroup } from "src/api/apiGroups"; import { Redirect } from "react-router"; export default function Add_group() { const page_name = "Group"; const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const [groupname, setGroupName] = useState([]); const [redirect, setRedirect] = useState(false); const [values,setValues] = useState({}); const handleChange = (e) => { setValues({ ...values, [e.target.name] : e.target.value, }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); insertGroup (values) .then(response => { if(response.status === 200){ window.location.reload(); } }) .catch(err => alert("Something Went Wrong")); } useEffect(()=>{ getAllGroup() .then(response => setGroupName(response.data)) .catch(err => alert("Something went wrong!")) },[]) return (
Click to add a new group {`Fill ${page_name} Details`} {/* Form Start */} {`${page_name} Name`} {/* Form End */} {/* Modal End */} Select Group Name

); }
